attributes.action: make sure that petitions are reviewed properly and not rejected because of simple spelling mistakes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have noticed that some petitions are rejected becuse they simply have a spelling mistakes or poor grammar. I have noticed many petitions that have been rejected because "It contained wording that is impossible to understand". When I checked these petitions myself I found that some of the petitions were genuinely illegible. But I also saw some petitions that I could easily understand but has a few rroneous spellings and poor grammer. I think that mor care should be taken in reading these petitions. As some people have trouble with their spelling and grammar, I myself suffer with dyslexia. i believe that more care should be taken in understanding petitions with poor grammar and spelling. I have tried my best to explain this petition without using "provocative language" and tried to keep my spelling and grammar as legible as I can. If their is any wording that you find hard to understand pleas e-mail me and I will be happy to explain.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
